name: Impulse
blurb: Don't just LISTEN to your music -- PLAY it!

rewards.reward: STANDARD:\r\n** One DRM-FREE DIGITAL COPY of the game when it is released. If the game gets on Steam, we will work with Valve to get every backer a steam version of the game as well. ** Make your pledge now to lock in this kickstarter-only price!\r\n** License valid on ALL platforms! (Mac, Windows, and Linux)

PREMIUM: All STANDARD rewards +  ** 3 DAY EARLY ACCESS to the final game before it gets released to the public! ** Your NAME will be in the CREDITS! ** Also, RESERVE YOUR USERNAME in all current and future 4Kore games and forums with an exclusive founder account and badge!
DOUBLE PREMIUM: ** TWO copies of all PREMIUM rewards! Share with a friend! (2x drm-free digital copies of Impulse, 2x early access passes, 2x reserved usernames, 2x names in the credits)
MEGA: All PREMIUM rewards + ** Get ALL Impulse DLC for FREE ** Get an exclusive DLC package only for MEGA backers and higher. (cosmetic only, does not affect game balance)
DOUBLE MEGA: ** TWO copies of all MEGA rewards! Share with a friend! (All DOUBLE PREMIUM rewards + 2x all Impulse DLC for free, 2x DLC packages exclusive to MEGA backers or higher)

EPIC: All MEGA rewards + ** CLOSED BETA ACCESS! Get access to the game before anyone else and play a valuable part in the direction of the game as it's being developed! ** Your name will be featured in both the credits and the game's startup splash screen wall-of-backers mini-game!
DOUBLE EPIC: ** TWO copies of all EPIC rewards! Share with a friend! (All DOUBLE MEGA rewards + 2x closed beta accounts, 2x wall-of-backers splash screen names)

ULTIMATE: All EPIC rewards + ** You get a license good for the next 10 GAMES with ALL DLC on ALL platforms that 4Kore creates! Wow! ** Your name will be extra large in the wall-of-backers splash screen mini-game. ** Your username and badge in all 4Kore games and forums will be tagged as an ULTIMATE backer.

DOUBLE ULTIMATE: TWO copies of all ULTIMATE rewards! Share with a friend! (All DOUBLE EPIC rewards + 2x licenses for next 10 games with all DLC on all platforms that 4Kore creates, 2x extra large wall-of-backers name, 2x ultimate backer usernames and badges in all 4Kore games and forums)

IMMORTAL: ** Your name and picture will be featured prominently on the 4Kore website and at the top of the game's credits. ** Your name will also be a mini-boss in the wall-of-backers splash screen mini-game. ** Your username and badge in all 4Kore games and forums will be tagged as an IMMORTAL backer. ** Also includes TEN copies of all ULTIMATE rewards to do with as you please.

BACKER PRIME: You win the internet. ** All IMMORTAL rewards + Your name and picture will be the biggest on the 4Kore website, at the very top of the game's credits, and your name will be the final boss in the wall-of-backers splash screen mini-game. ** Also, design an entire boss encounter for the main Impulse game that will be played by everyone. ** Your username and badge in all 4Kore games and forums will be tagged as BACKER PRIME. ** Only ONE person can claim this reward! First come, first serve.
